sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 40: 治鼻面酒皻皰 方。木蘭皮（半斤銼），醋（一斤三年者）。上件藥相和，浸二七日， 取焙乾，搗細羅為散。每於食後，以温酒調下一錢 , “Recipe to cure the nose and face with wine sediment blisters: mu lan skin (one half jin , file
d) , vinegar (one half jin , three years ol

d) . Mix the pharmaceutical substances listed above and allow to soak for two times seven days. Then roast until dry and pound through a fine sieve to obtain a powder. Ingest one qian mixed with warm wine after each meal”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu lan 木蘭 quotes Gu jin lu yan Recipe book. Tang era, ca. 7th century. 古今錄驗 : 面上齇皰：䵟 𪒟 。用 木蘭皮一斤，細切，以三年酢漿漬之百日，晒乾搗末 , “[To cure] facial sediments blisters : [For] dermal dark spots: use 1 jin of mu lan skin, finely cut, and soak in three-year-old vinegar for 100 days. Then dry in the sun, and pound to a powder”.
